values:
Oh it's true...

It's Bob-DAMNED TRUE!

I am back, and better than ever, bitches.

So you know what's awesome? Being able to support yourself. I live on my own, and can have my friends over at will... it rocks pretty hardcore.

I swear I'm going to update again soon, as I have a plan.

So... for the first time in literally over a year...

HAVE A NICE DAY!

So, we saw "Good Shepard".... for three and a half hours... Yeah... not fun. Bad Movie, only thing that saved it, was us makign fun of it.

It was good to see Austin and Megan again, they were fun, as usual. And kept us entertained. I woned the arm rests, and the thearter.

More later, overall, despite the movie, I had the best night in a long time.

Do you know what it's like to feel completely worthless and useless....

I didn't, but now I do... I can't even do the one thing I promised myself I'd do...

Searching for a way... not finding one...

Please, I hope you... Have A Nice Day!

So, I'm offically going to strangle the managers at Office Depot. The new floor manager is a tool/retard, and the store manager seems a bit mulit-personal. He seems like he's being an ass, but everyone says he's just kidding. Can't figure him out. Meh.

In other news, Within the month, I will have a car. My friend Nick is selling me his van, which looks pretty crappy, but runs really well. It's not a convertable, but it runs well, and should last me a while. Besides, I owe everyone rides for the rest of eternity, this way, I can fit you all in at once, heh.

I'm gonig to Atlanta next weekend. DragonCon calls me. Basiclly, if you didn't know, my brother and I play card games, specificly and mainly, WWE Raw Deal. Sept 2nd is a World Championship qualifier, and we're going. Last year, it was in Orlando, and my brother was one win away from going to the world championships. Hopefully, my s3cr3t t3ch is enough to win this year, as a free trip to Detroit and awesome tickets for Wrestlemania for my brother and I would be frickin' awesome.

I'm making more of an effort lately to hang out with people, as I'm working alot, and have noticed I'm in grumpy moods. I think it's from lack of Social Exposure, and I refuse to go down like that. If anybody wants to hang out or anything... just give me a call, an e-mail, or hell, leave a message on here, I'll get it. Well, that's all the major updates, anything else is pretty meaningless and will make me sound like I'm rambling....like right now.

Have A Nice Day!

So, I'm actually in New Hampshire right now. It's awesome, I'm with Jess and Tina, they still haven't failed to make me happy every time I come here.

Saw "Depp Plays A Pirate" part 2 and it was pretty good. The ending was a bi "Blah" but still good.

I'll be back in Daytona on Aug3rd, most likely work on Aug 4th, Ha!

See everybody soon, and from the Granite State...

Have A Nice Day!!
D4MN, TH4T5 R1GHT! SM4CK! N3W L4Y0UT! D0N3 8Y T0R4K1T5UN3, 81-40TCH35!!!

Hey everybody. just letting people know I am not dead.

Not alot happening lately... I miss all my friends.

I'm leaving for my dad's on thursday, if you wanna hang out, call me before then.

thanks... oh have a nice day.

In case you didn't know, just wanted people to know I have an extraordinary talent to screw up the simplest task.

I can't ever do anything accoring to plan... and it rarely works out in the end.

I guess some of us are simply -DOOMED-

At least you'll Have A Nice Day!!

Bob is having a celebratory get-together this weekend. He has Friday and Saturday off of work. If anybody would like to attend, please give me a preference on the day/night you could make it. I'd like as many people as possible there, so please, tell me when's convieant for you.

It would mean alot for any and all of my friends to attend.

Thanks alot, and as always, Have A Nice Day!!

I'm the center of my own universe
and I'm sitting on top of my world
I'm the middle of my attention
and I'm the best joke I've ever heard
I'm the king of my own castle
and I'm the master of my own mind
I'm the best friend that I've ever had
the best friend that I'll ever find
I'm the nicest person I've ever met
the only person that I'll never forget
I'm the best sex that I've ever had
the one relationship I'll never regret

I can see them coming
I can see them coming
I can see them coming
I can see them coming

(We want to lock you up) they want to lock me up
(We want to put you away) they want to put me away
(We want to shut you up) they want to shut me up
(We want you out of the way) they want me out of the way

I'm the greatest star in my hall of fame
I'm the host of my own show
I'm the main character in my book
I'm the most humble guy I know
I'm the leader of my own army
I'm the feeder of my chosen ones
I'm the atom bomb that'll blow my world
all the way to my kingdom come
I'm the god of my own bible
I'm the Jesus of my own cross
I'm the saviour of my own people
and my own greatest loss

I can see them coming
I can see them coming
I can see them coming
I can see them coming

(We want to put you away) they want to put me away
(We want to shut you up) they want to shut me up
(We want you out of the way) they want me out of the way

I think I'm going crazy
I think I'm going crazy
I think I'm going crazy
I think I'm going crazy I'm losing my mind

(We want to lock you up) they want to lock me up
(We want to put you away) they want to put me away
(We want to shut you up) they want to shut me up
(We want you out of the way) they want me out of the way

The Answer To Life
by: Bob Theriault

Life is a Paradox.
Wants, Needs, and Responsibility.
Three Words, Three Ideas, Three Differences.
Balance The Three, Live Happily.

Life Is A Conundrum.
A Question Without Answer.
Life Rings With Questions,
Life Lays Silent Without Answers.

Life Is A Riddle.
An Odd Situation, An Odd Solution.
The Mind Cannot Break The Code.
The Body Cannot Move Without The Resolution.

Life Is A Contradiction.
Gaining By Losing, Hurting By Loving.
Sacrificing For Nothing, Waiting For No One.
Living Only To Die, Dying To Live.

Leave your name and:
1. I'll respond with something random about you.
2. I'll tell you what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. I'll pick a flavor of jello to wrestle with you in.
4. I'll say something that only makes sense to you and me.
5. I'll tell you my first/clearest memory of you.
6. I'll tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll ask you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. If I do this for you, you must post this on your journal.

This entry was origionally going to be random words and thoughts... but I thought this worked jsut as well...

Here's to random acts of free movie...
Here's to the Underdog...
Here's Chicken Little...
Here's To the Cell phone warning...
Here's to huge ass trunks...
Here's to leveling up...
Here's to bags of popcorn...
Here's to sucking popcorn...
Here's to "the freezee"...
Here's to snorting...
Here's to speechlessness...
Here's to "who we talkin' about?"...
Here's to the pimp hat...
Here's to the short water fountain...
Here's to my friend...

and this is gonna sound really corny... but...
Here's to what I was thinking about all night... two months...

:::what if:::
* i died?
* i lied to you?
* i said i loved you?
* it was the last day we had together?
* i kissed you?
* i asked you for help?
* i cried?
* i killed someone?

::am i::
* quiet?
* shy?
* a brat?
* boring?
* pretty?
* selfish?
* annoying?

::would you::
* be my friend?
* be more than a friend?
* keep a secret if i told you one?
* let me cry on your shoulder?

* make a move on me?
* tell me your deepest secret?
* try and solve my problems?
* love me?
* hate me for anything?

:: have you ever::
* lied to make me feel better?
* wanted to help me but didn't know how?
* wanted to kill me?
* broke my heart?
* kept something important from me?
* thought i was unbearably annoying?

::and more::
* who are you?
* are we really friends?
* when and how did we meet?
* describe me in one word.
* what was your first impression of me?
* do you still think that way about me now?
* what reminds you of me?
* how well do you know me?
* whens the last time you saw me?
* ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't?
* are you gonna post this as a bulletin to see what i say about you?
* what's the funnest memory you have about me?

...Untill it's almost gone...

I figured another post would be alot easier than replying to every comment on my last post.

Thank you guys, I talked to my dad, told him what happened, and he said the nicest thing ever. "I won't let you live here. I'm forcing you to go back."

So, worst case scenario, I'll jsut need to find a place to live when I get back. No big deal.

Thank you again, and I love you all.

Have A Nice Day!!

I'm leaving Florida on June 20th.

I had a bad fight with my mother tonight...

She doesn't want me to come back from Massachusetts...

The tickets I already have to come back bring me back on July 28th.

That's all for now...

Have A Nice Day!!

P.S. - I don't want to think about this, but If I don't come back from my Dad's house... Thank you, everyone... I love you all. You guys are my life, and I've loved every fay of every month of every year I've been here, thank you...

I only have one thing to say...

Star Wars > j00

Take the quiz: "Are you a Jedi or Sith?"

Mace Windu - Jedi Master
You are a Jedi Master. Your wisest among all of the Jedi. A true master in all aspects of the Force, a Jedi Master is also the most formidable warrior when equipped with a lightsaber. Having mastered the Jedi ranks through the use of both the healing and harming facets of the Force, the Master is now only one step away from becoming completely and totally one with the Force. I'm Shaft, Mudda fuggas.

Cake....

Angie's makign cake. I'm staying away, because LB and Angie are crazy...

After I fill up on cake, and I go home... I'll have an actual update... as I had alot of fun with Amber today, also with Angie, LB, and Hannah.

So, yeah, two, soon to be three updates in less than a week...

Time to close down LJ.

Have A Nice Day!!

Holy Crap, I'm updating. 

I had half a mind to make that the update.

Anyways...

Lots-o-crap gone on since I last updated like four months ago... To save time, I'll update the latest, large events.

Clarissa's Birthday: She got to have the party she wanted, although plans changed last minute, I'm glad she still got her party. Unfortunaly, I missed a good four hours of it due to Drama's Variety Show, but then i returned, but then had to leave early. Wish I could've spent more time with everyone, but I had fun...

Drama: We had our last meeting on Thursday, and the week before that, we had the Variety Show. I worked the sound and the first night it went nearly perfect. The second Night, I made a small mistake, but Tara (Person in charge) and Andrew (person on stage at the time) didn't mind, and Tara even hugged me afterwards and thanked me. Tara's also gonig to be the president next year, and I think She'll do a good job, she seems to be an awesome person so far.

Me: Still no idea when I'm going to Dad's house, or even if i still am. Also, I -REALLY- don't like mentioning this a million times, so I'll say it once... Thursday is my 19th Birthday. Not sure what I want, you people all know me pretty well, so if you're having trouble finding somehting, just ask, but gifts are not nessicary. I don't know if there will be a party, but if there is, I'll be sure to invite as many people as possible.

Well, that's all I can think of for now, so I'll close with a hope for the Boston Celtics, possibly making the Championships a Hat Trick for Boston this year. oh yeah, and always remember to... 

Have A Nice Day!!

[01] Reply with your name and I will write something about you.

[02] I will then tell what song[s] remind me of you.

[03] Next, I will tell you who you remind me of, celebrity/animated or otherwise.

[04] Last, I will try to name a single word that best describes you.

[05] Put this in your journal! 

Stole this from Nick, now you must indure it's wrath.

Hey Yo!

Yeah, So I've been lazy, so sue me.

I have alot to talk about, and not enough sleep to tell it on.

Basiclly what I'll talk about in this little diddy are my friends.

All of you guys I haven't talked to in a while, or haven't hung out with, I'm really sorry, I feel like crap right now because I'm suddenly realizing how many of you I've been leaving out lately, I'm truly sorry. Everybody that's been hangin' out with me on the one or two days I have avalible, thanks, I appriciate it. Oh, and Clarissa, thanks for one of the most fun times I've had in a while. Honestly, I haven't been able to hang out with anybody for a while, and hanging out with you was a load of fun.

Well, again, sorry for not updating, for not talking to people, and whatnot.

I love you all, and please, feel free to call me anytime, my phone's always on.

Have A Nice Day!!

Alright, so I just thought of this after I posted that other comment.

Anybody who reads this would do me a world of good to reply to this comment with a few things they would be excited to recieve from me as a gift during this holiday season, on whichever of the random holidays you celebrate.

Oh yeah, and none of this "Oh, you don't have to get me a gift," bull. I'm getting you something, deal with it, might as well enjoy it.

Thanks guys, Have A Nice Day!!

Hey Yo!

Yeah, so I haven't felt well, and haven't been near the internet in alittle while, see a connection? I think I'm an addict, oh well.

Anywyas, work's been fun. Got suspended for a week because my mom forgot to bring me to work. Heh, but it did have a good side, the Head Chef, Kenny was arguing with Katerina, the Manager about punishing me, because I am, and I quote, "A Fucking Good Cook, and Just Plain Nice Kid." I like that. I might make that my offical title. Heh.

Well, Katerina went on this whole rant about how she could never trust me by myself now, and then she schedules me for Sunday, by myself, for the first time ever. I think kenny ended up winning that argument, heh. So, soon I'll be running that resturant. Heh.

Well, thanks for reading, and as always...

Have A Nice Day!!

Yeah, so being sick offically sucks. I've got a friggin' cold, and I keep sneezing and coughing. Bastard germs!! I was so sick this weekend, I missed Eevee's play. I feel horrible. I was looking forward to it, too! I heard you guys all kicked ass, and I'll get a tape from Conrad. Anyways, hopefully I'll be at 100% health soon, and I'll be able to work my ass off to get money for all of you people by Christmas time. Damn, snuffles suck. Anyways, just a short one for now, I'm sure I'll think of something else to rant about between Math and Chem. Lab. So, for now... Have A Nice Day!!

Hell fricken Yeah. Went to Seabreeze today at about 8:30 to pick up tickets for The Odd Couple , and ended up spending the entire school day there with my friends and the old drama kids. Had a hella lot of fun. It was friggin' awesome, untill Jesse broke her thumb. Luckily, Conrad said she'd be good for the play, so break a friggin' leg Jesse, and everybody, Eevee, Brian, Scotty B., Annie, Emily, Kelly, anybody else I forgot that reads my journal, sorry, break two friggin' legs. Anyways, speaking of opening nights, Five Women Wearing The Same Dress opens in a few hours. Dunno how it's gonna end, but I'm running consessions, so I gotta go. Have A Nice Day!!

Now, before I say anything else... What did I tell you? Fuck The Yankees, Fuck Babe Ruth, Fuck The Curse, MY Red Sox Are God damned Champions!! Heh!! Anyways...Just reporting in to say hi, and post this survey thingy. Have A Nice Day!! Take the quiz: "What is YOUR terror alert color?"

Green
Awww! Isn't it cute. Your terror alert color is Green (LOW). You are so blissfully naive. Your delusions of peace are as ironically boundless as the hate in this world. Take the quiz: "Which Playing Card Are You?"

The Joker
Wild, foolish, and unruly, You are the Joker!

Well, today is my little brother's Birthday. He turns 16, and he's been bugging me for MONTHS for what I should get him. Just figured I'd let the few people on here that know him, that today is Kris "Omi" Theirualt's Sixteenth Birthday, and if you see him today, pester the living hell out of him. That is all.

P.S.: I am less than twenty-four hours from seeing history made as my Boston Red Sox Reverse The Curse, heh.

Well, in 11 days, I'll be homeless.

You see, the lease on the place we live now runs out at the end of October, and when my mom moves out, she's not-so-kindly asked me to also move out. So, now I'm homeless, well, in November I'm homeless. 

I hate to do this, but can anybody let me stay with them for a few days, just until I find my own place? I'd obviously reimburse you for the time I stayed, I just need to have a place to sleep in.

Well, that's really al at's happened recently, so untill next time...

Have A Nice Day!!

Well, just not my weekend I suppose. Burnt myself at work, nothing bad, just annoying. Then I continued to be hounded by my mother for a grand total of three straight days. Then I woke up by falling out of bed and hitting my head on the nightstand, always fun. Then, Saturday, when I was actually starting to have a good day, Adam comes in on his way to homecoming. I was talking and joking with him, when he apparently took offense to one joke and KICKED ME IN THE NUTS!!! I swear, out of nowhere, he just kicked me right in the junk. Damn him, and damn not being able to sit for two days. He meant to kick my leg, but missed and crippled me momentarily. I was able to hold in crying until the cute girls were gone, but once they left, I bawled my eyes out. It was horrible. Then I had to go back to work for another three hours. It was not a good night. good news is I FINALLY get paid tomorrow, and then I work on Wednesday, finally getting schedueled at least an extra day. So, my weekend was kind abland, besides to crippling pain when I go to sit or stand. That'll pass... Oh well, since i can't seem to, i wish you...

Have A Nice Day!

P.S. Red Sox v. Yankees Game 1 tomorrow night, I'm friggin' psyched!!

-RIP- Rodney Dangerfield -RIP-
Nov 22, 1921 - Oct 5, 2004
Much Respect to You

Heh, you know what everybody needs to do once in a while, everybody just needs to let some emotion out. I did that last night. It was fun. For some reason I just felt strange last night, at first I thought it was anger, so I went outside with a large box and my sword and beat that all to hell. That was fun, but i still felt off... I decided to play Tales Of Symphonia for alittle while, but that didn't help. Then I was watching LAX, which was a surprisingly good show, and Ikept feeling like I wanted to cry. It was wierd. I just decided to go to sleep, and when I woke up this morning, I felt fine... Oh Well.

Today I'm going to learn karate with LB and Hannah. Should be quite interesting. Hannah told me it's alot of grappling and stuff, so I should be good. Then again, I'll probally just break my arm and move on. I'm at school right now, just hanging out. Haven't heard from ym stalker yet today.

The last thing I need to say is that the first game of Major League Baseball Playoffs is today. The Red Sox are taking on the Angels, and we need to win this one. This has to be the year we reverse the curse. So pray to whatever god you worship for the victory of the Sox. I'll be keeping up with the game, although it starts right before I have to go to karate. Anyways, Go SOX!

oh...

And Have A Nice Day!!

Well, today started off pretty normally, I woke up, got on the bus and went to school. I was chillin' in the library, using their computers when I got an Instant Message from a random screen name. I asked who it was and the girl said that it was just somebody I sat next to a few days ago, and she thought I was cute so she leaned over and got my screen name 'cause she was too shy to talk to me. So, now I apparently have a stalker. Oh well, she hasn't gotten dangerous yet, so it's fine.

On another note, in the courtyard at lunch, this girl asked me to register to vote, but I already had, then she randomly asked me about a bunch of different things, and we ended up talking for a few hours. She's really cool and funny, and she lives less than two minutes from my work. She said she was gonig to come visit me tomorrow while I'm working, so that should be fun.

Today jsut seems to be my type of day, and it's only half done, can't wait to see what else happens.

Well...there's apparently a big storm cloud heading in the general direction of Florida. Now, I expect to get called an idiot for this, but it I honestly don't believe it's going to be that bad. I just have this feeling. Oh well, in any case, Mom's making us leave Daytona, which I don't want to do, since my friends will still be here, hating leaving them behind. I'd rather stay and watch myself get proven right. Oh well.

In Other News,

I'm now offically employed, and I can offically cook food for complete strangers. I got hired as a cook at Song Mongolian Grill. It's on of those cool places where i cook in front of people and do flips with the spatula and stuff. It's gonna eb fun, and according to Adam, good pay. I'm excited to start, but I'm suppsoed to start Friday, and Mom's making us run scared. I'll call them up and hopefully NOT get fired.

Well..that's all i can think, so Have A Nice Day!!

At your ten year high school reunion... by robbiewriter

Quiz created with MemeGen!

Welll...I'll have to start this one off with an offical appology. I'm sorry I haven't updated since the first week of June. Been outta town, and had no internet access. Well, I'm back, and better than ever as I start my adventures into College. I know at least two people in each of my classes, so it's pretty cool. I also got my tuition paid for through a drama scholarship, so that's very cool. Well, I gott ahead off to class now, so once again... Have A Nice Day!

Well...been out of Florida for two weeks now. HAven't had time to update, sorry.

I got a request from Andrea to post, so here's your post.

I'm currently in my hometown, Hooksett, New Hampshire. It feels good to be home, yet, strange at the same time. I'm staying at my long-time friend's house. Jessica's a sweetheart. I'm with my old friends, in my old town, and it doesn't feel like I thought it would. I still love this though, although I can't wait to get back to Florida, and be with y friends down there again. I miss you all. Well, not feeling very inspired tonight, so I'll update later. Whomever you are, where ever you live, I miss you, I'll see you soon. Never Give Up and Always...

Have A Nice Day!!

Well, had fun yesterday. Went to L.B.'s house, and hung out with her, Ian, and Eevee. That was fun, well, besides having to walk there because I misunderstood what LB was trying to tell me...She tried to say "Call me if you can't get a ride..." Add in phone static and my random ignorance and that comes out, "Sorry, I can't give you a ride." Hung out with them, watched TV, went in the pool, good times. 

Then i got home and realized that I'm not going to be here much longer. 

Thursday I leave for Massachusetts. This sucks. I really don't want to go anymore. I like my friends down here. I can't get in touch with most of my northern friends anymore. The ones I can get in touch with are either going out of town right when i come in town, moving forever...or ust generaloly aren't good company. I'm gonna miss my Florida friends...

Then I realized something else...

I don't have many close friends that want to hang out outside of school either. I mean, all my drama friends, they'll hang out with me, sometimes. Then there's Angie, L.B. and that group, and that's about it.

Oh Well, I'll get over it, I'm sure. I always get like this right before I go back up North, but usually, I want to go back to Dad's, this time, for some reason, I'm not looking forward to it too much. Well, That's enough for now.

if you want to hang out with me today, Wednesday, the last day I'm in Florida, give me a call...603-264-6771 or just come by my house, most of you know where I live. I'll see you all soon, and as always...

Have A Nice Day!!
